title: 服务端的一个奇怪的BUG
author: alitely
txt_content:
本帖最后由 balitely 于 2019-10-5 16:52 编辑 

如题，用的是官方的服务端，就是那个装不了插件的服务端
服务端开启完毕之后会一直刷一条信息
[14:20:50] [Server thread/INFO] [net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer]: Unknown command. Try /help for a list of commands
像这样子的
如果在控制台打/help会这样


[14:21:53] [Server thread/信息]: Unknown command. Try /help for a list of commands
[14:21:56] [Server thread/信息]: An unknown error occurred while attempting to perform this command
[14:21:56] [Server thread/ERROR]: Couldn't process command: 'help'
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Comparison method violates its general contract!
 at java.util.ComparableTimSort.mergeHi(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_45]
 at java.util.ComparableTimSort.mergeAt(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_45]
 at java.util.ComparableTimSort.mergeForceCollapse(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_45]
 at java.util.ComparableTimSort.sort(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_45]
 at java.util.Arrays.sort(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_45]
 at java.util.Arrays.sort(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_45]
 at java.util.ArrayList.sort(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_45]
 at java.util.Collections.sort(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_45]
 at net.minecraft.command.CommandHelp.func_71534_d(SourceFile:84) ~[au.class:?]
 at net.minecraft.command.CommandHelp.func_71515_b(SourceFile:38) ~[au.class:?]
 at net.minecraft.command.CommandHandler.func_71556_a(CommandHandler.java:94) [z.class:?]
 at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71333_ah(DedicatedServer.java:370) [lt.class:?]
 at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:335) [lt.class:?]
 at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:547) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
 at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:427) [MinecraftServer.class:?]
 at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer$2.run(MinecraftServer.java:685) [li.class:?]
[14:21:56] [Server thread/信息]: An unknown error occurred while attempting to perform this command
[14:21:56] [Server thread/ERROR]: Couldn't process command: 'help'
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Comparison method violates its general contract!
 at java.util.ComparableTimSort.mergeHi(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_45]
 at [14:22:08] [Server thread/信息]: Unknown command. Try /help for a list of commands
[14:22:11] [Server thread/信息]: Unknown command. Try /help for a list of commands

在服务器里面打/help会显示执行命令时出现错误


还有两个崩服的BUG
一个是全服人突然全部连接超时
过一会就又可以连接了

一个是服务端直接崩溃关闭
而且会清空玩家背包里面的物品
不在服里面的玩家不受影响
附件是崩服的crashreport

replies.author: mc能吃吗
replies.txt_content:
官服最好还是别用。。可以试试paper或者catserver
以及mod列表最好发一下

replies.author: 红尘红尘y
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: alitely
replies.txt_content:
官服核心我用的是最新的emmm
大佬你们有合适的老版本核心吗

插件服我之前开过但是延迟严重.....
实在不行的话我一定会考虑的说
mod列表补充了
